summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of Teams 24 Careers Job Board after Next.js + PostgreSQL migration. All features working correctly: Job-Centric Admin Dashboard, SEO-optimized job pages with meta tags and JSON-LD, application form submission, Kanban/Table views, stage management.

issues: Admin login button missing data-testid attribute (minor)

critical_code_review_comments: All APIs working correctly with PostgreSQL
SEO features properly implemented (meta tags, JSON-LD structured data)
Job-centric admin dashboard navigation working as expected
Kanban and Table views both functional
Stage change via dropdown menu working correctly
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up test application (TEST_Playwright User) during UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Next.js + PostgreSQL migration complete. All Option A features implemented and working: 1) Job-Centric Admin Dashboard at /admin/jobs with status filters, 2) Per-job applications view at /admin/jobs/[id] with Kanban/Table toggle, 3) SEO-optimized /careers and /careers/[slug] pages with meta tags and JSON-LD. Database has 5 jobs and 8 applications. Rating display now working correctly (fixed from previous iteration).

features_tested.landing_page: PASS - Shows 4 published jobs from PostgreSQL
features_tested.careers_listing: PASS - Shows all published jobs with category filters
features_tested.individual_job_page: PASS - SEO-friendly URL, meta tags, JSON-LD structured data
features_tested.application_form: PASS - Form submission creates application in database
features_tested.admin_jobs_dashboard: PASS - Shows all jobs with status filters (Published, Draft, Paused, Closed)
features_tested.per_job_applications: PASS - Kanban board shows only that job's candidates
features_tested.stage_change: PASS - Dropdown menu allows changing candidate stage
features_tested.view_toggle: PASS - Toggle between Kanban and Table views
features_tested.api_health: PASS - /api/health returns healthy status with database connected
features_tested.jobs_api: PASS - CRUD operations, slug support, status filtering
